name: Boss of this gym
description:
Boss Of This Gym is a unique runner expirences, which will fullfill your ♂deep dark fantasies♂ of dominating Van and his ♂Slaves♂



You start as a weakling, with a cheap car and no drinks to help you. Collect weights to exchange them for some tonics and a new ride. Upgrade yourself by buying masks which will increase the amount of weights you gain.

Unique characteristics


-Lots of obstacles and things not ot ♂stick your finger♂ into
-Different masks and various upgrades for your racing machine
-Tonics will help you if you fall
-UNIQUE boss fight
-Avoid ♂fisting♂ and try to keep yourself unlubed
